T02D3070:168a-0: @168a # // bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3070:168a-1: bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs dang /
T02D3070:168b-0: rgyud dag @168b las tsee tya dang /
T02D3070:168b-1: tsha tsha gdab ba la sogs pa'i cho ga / a'a ts'arya dharma k'irti dang /
T02D3070:168b-3: badzra bo dhi la sogs pa las thos nas /
T02D3070:168b-4: slob dpon de dag gis lung bstan te /
T02D3070:168b-5: gtan la phab par byas pa'o //
T02D3070:168b-6: de la dang po tsee tya gdab pa'i sa gzhi ni /
T02D3070:168b-9: rab la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i nang bde bar dkyil 'khor du bya ba'i sa brtag pa ni //
T02D3070:168b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi zabs su khru gang brkos las rnag byung na bzang /
T02D3070:168b-11: rus ba dang gyo mo la sogs pa byung na yang /
T02D3070:168b-12: de dag ma lus par bsal te sa brkos pa de'i dbus su /
T02D3070:168b-13: gser dang dngul dang zangs dang kham pa gang 'byor
T02D3070:168b-14: pa snod sbyar ma'i nang du rin po che dang
T02D3070:168b-15: / 'bru nang sman sna lnga dang spos dag blugs nas /
T02D3070:168b-16: kha bcad de bzhag las bzang pos bkang ste /
T02D3070:168b-17: de'i steng du dkyil 'khor 'dom do gru bzhi 'phang du khru gang pa legs pa cig byas la /
T02D3070:168b-18: dkyil 'khor de'i ngos gcig kyang khru gang gru bzhi
T02D3070:168b-19: pa'i dkyil 'khor chung du gnyis gnyis mgo snyoms te
T02D3070:168b-20: / dkyil 'khor chen po dang 'brel par byas te /
T02D3070:168b-21: dkyil 'khor de'i steng du za'og dang /
T02D3070:168b-22: ras la sogs pa gang 'byor ba'i bla re 'dom phyed dang gsum /
T02D3070:168b-23: khru bzhi pa yan chad 'dom gang yang yan chad bre /
T02D3070:168b-24: 'phan brgyad yan chad du 'byor pa gdags /
T02D3070:168b-25: phyogs bzhir rgyal mtshan bzhi gzugs /
T02D3070:168b-26: bla re de'i dbus su dar ram /
T02D3070:168b-27: ras sam shog bu srid du mda' gang /
T02D3070:168b-28: zheng du khru gang lhag tsam grva sbyar /
T02D3070:168b-29: phyogs bzhir mchod rten dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /
T02D3070:168b-30: 'phang lo bdun dang ldan pa re res bres te /
T02D3070:168b-31: de'i bum pa'i dbus nas thad kar bi ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs sngags 'di gur kum gyis bri /
T02D3070:168b-33: aom na ma stre ya dhvi k'a n'am /
T02D3070:168b-34: sarba ta th'a ga ta hri da ya garbhe /
T02D3070:168b-35: dzva la dzva la dharma dh'a tu garbhe /
T02D3070:168b-37: sam bha ra a'a yu: sam sho dha ya /
T02D3070:168b-40: sa mantoshn'i sha bi ma le bi shuddhe /
T02D3070:168b-41: h'um h'um h'um h'um aam bam sam dza: sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:168b-42: de nas mchod rten de'i 'phang lo'i steng du bi
T02D3070:168b-43: ma la aushn'i sha'i gzungs 'dis gdugs lta bur 'khyil
T02D3070:168b-46: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02D3070:168b-47: ma h'a tsint'a ma ni dzva la na s'a ga ra /
T02D3070:169a-1: re a'a karsha ya a'a karsha ya /
T02D3070:169a-9: sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a sa ma ye /
T02D3070:169a-11: ma h'a bhu ba na s'a ga re /
T02D3070:169a-20: spho ta ya spho ta ya /
T02D3070:169a-27: aushn'i sha bya ba lo ki te /
T02D3070:169a-29: sa manta bya ba lo ki te /
T02D3070:169a-31: ma h'a p'a sha dha re /
T02D3070:169a-32: aa mo gha bi ma le /
T02D3070:169a-35: a'a kaddhya ya a'a kaddhya ya /
T02D3070:169a-37: sam bh'a ra sam bh'a ra /
T02D3070:169a-41: ma h'a mu dr'a bi lo ki te /
T02D3070:169a-45: bo dha ni bo dha ni /
T02D3070:169a-46: sam bo dha ni sam bo dha ni /
T02D3070:169a-47: sho dha ni sho dha ni /
T02D3070:169a-48: sam sho dha ni sam sho dha ni /
T02D3070:169a-49: bi sho dha ni bi sho dha ni ha ra ha ra /
T02D3070:169a-56: bi na shyam tu p'a pam /
T02D3070:169a-57: sarba kilbi shaha re ma ni bi shuddhe /
T02D3070:169a-61: ka ba tsi ta bhu dze /
T02D3070:169a-64: sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha bi ma le bi lo ki te sva h'a /
T02D3070:169a-65: sarba ta th'a ga ta gu hya /
T02D3070:169a-66: aa dhishth'a na aa dhishth'i te sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-67: aom a'a yurda de sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-69: pun+ya aa ba lo ki te sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-72: ya ma d'u ti sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-73: sam ha ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-74: sam bha ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-76: pra ti sa ra ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-77: ao dzo ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-78: te dzo ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-79: dza ya ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-80: sarba ta th'a ga te mu dra aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te sv'a h'a /
T02D3070:169a-82: gdugs de las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'khrigs ba bre /
T02D3070:169a-83: de'i gzhi'i dbus su dar ram shog shog gang 'byor pa las /
T02D3070:169a-84: srid du mda' gang tsam zheng du khru gang lhag tsam la /
T02D3070:169a-85: gzungs gnyis ka rdzogs par bri zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang ldan par byas te /
T02D3070:169a-86: dbus kyi mchod rten ring 'bsrel can de la mi reg tu gdags /
T02D3070:169a-87: de nas dkyil 'khor de'i steng lci ba gtsang ma dang /
T02D3070:169b-0: gur kum la sogs pas @169b bskus la /
T02D3070:169b-1: de'i steng du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ngos gcig la re'u bcu bcu /
T02D3070:169b-2: re'u gcig la yang chag gang dang /
T02D3070:169b-3: tshon do'i thad du brtsis te /
T02D3070:169b-5: srad bu ring thung cha mnyam pa cig tshon sna gcig gis thig btab ste /
T02D3070:169b-6: re'u brgya dang ngos gcig kyang re'u gnyis gnyis yod pa dang /
T02D3070:169b-7: spyir brgya rtsa brgyad du sbyar /
T02D3070:169b-8: re'u re re'i steng du yang tsee tya gzhag pa'i
T02D3070:169b-9: bzhi tsandan dang spos chu gang 'byor pas dkyil 'khor
T02D3070:169b-11: de nas las kyi bye brag las shar phyogs la sogs par gong thabs gsum gdeng /
T02D3070:169b-12: 'phan gdugs ci rigs par bres la ;
T02D3070:169b-13: steng dbus ma'i steng du tsee tya su 'degs pa
T02D3070:169b-14: 'dug / de'i g-yas kyi stan la bi ma la
T02D3070:169b-15: aushn'i sha'i gzungs sngags klog cing 'dug la /
T02D3070:169b-16: de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor cig byas pa'i steng du mchod pa sna lnga dgram /
T02D3070:169b-18: bya gang 'byor pa gcig spos chus bkang la /
T02D3070:169b-19: de'i nang du sman dang 'bru dang rin po che sna lnga lnga bcug la kha bcings te /
T02D3070:169b-20: de'i mgul nas srad bu gtsang ma gcig btags la
T02D3070:169b-21: sngags gnyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsam pa'i rgyud mnyam
T02D3070:169b-22: par bklag go // de la sman lnga ni sim ha dang /
T02D3070:169b-25: sa ha dang sa ha de ba'o ;
T02D3070:169b-30: rin po che sna lnga ni byu ru dang /
T02D3070:169b-31: gser sa le sbram dang dung dang /
T02D3070:169b-33: ming gis smos pa 'di rnams las dngos su ma 'byor na /
T02D3070:169b-34: gang 'byor pa de rnams las sna lngar sbyar ro //
T02D3070:169b-35: g-yon gyi stan la shes rab tshul brgya lnga bcu pa klog pa cig 'dug la /
T02D3070:169b-36: yo byad gzhan ni gong ma bzhin sbyar la dharma
T02D3070:169b-37: lan cig yan chad tsee tya 'debs kyi bar du
T02D3070:169b-38: rdzogs par bklag / dkyil 'khor gyi steng du tsee
T02D3070:169b-39: tya la sogs pa 'god pa'i gos dang /
T02D3070:169b-42: tsee tya 'debs pas bdag nyid rang gi lha'i tshul
T02D3070:169b-43: du ting nge 'dzin mnyam par byas te bi ma
T02D3070:169b-45: 'og nas tsee tya gdab pa'i sngags rim gyis 'byung ba gang yang rung ba des /
T02D3070:169b-46: bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan par byas te mchod cing tsee tya gdab bo /
T02D3070:170a-1: btab pa des thal byung du dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste /
T02D3070:170a-2: dang por mchod rten lugs ma sha ri ram yod
T02D3070:170a-3: pa cig dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi thig rgya gram
T02D3070:170a-4: yod pa'i steng gzhag / gzhan gyi las kyi khyad
T02D3070:170a-6: zhi ba ni byang shar mtshams nas shar lho mtshams
T02D3070:170a-7: su phreng gcig rdzogs par bkod la shar nas nub
T02D3070:170a-8: tu bsgre'o // tsee tya gcig btab ste /
T02D3070:170a-9: ri'u dbus su bzhag pa dang /
T02D3070:170a-10: dar dang shog shog gang 'byor pa'i rgyal mtshan chung du chu srin gyi mgo'am /
T02D3070:170a-11: tog zlum po gang 'byor pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D3070:170a-12: 'phan phran chung du re re gzugs mchod pa sna lnga yang rim bzhin du dbul zhing dgram /
T02D3070:170a-13: mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni bshos dang mar me dang /
T02D3070:170a-15: bdug spos dang me tog go //
T02D3070:170a-16: de bzhin du tsee tya re re btab cing mchod pa tshang bar dbul /
T02D3070:170a-17: dbus kyi 'khor lo'i steng mchod rten btab zin nas /
T02D3070:170a-18: mtha'i tsee tya brgyad dang shr lhor bskor zhing byang gi bar du rim bzhin dgod /
T02D3070:170a-19: de nas ts tya 'debs pa de bstan /
T02D3070:170a-21: bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa /
T02D3070:170a-22: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams spyan drangs la /
T02D3070:170a-23: dung phor la sogs pa gang 'byor pa'i nang du rin po che sna bdun dang /
T02D3070:170a-27: gur gum dang 'di rnams las ci 'byor pa bcug ste /
T02D3070:170a-28: aargha'i chu lan gsum du sbreng zhing bsam pa'i rgyud dang ldan pas dbul /
T02D3070:170a-29: de la rin po che sna bdun ni byu ru dang /
T02D3070:170a-30: gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags so //
T02D3070:170a-31: de nas kun du bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin phung
T02D3070:170a-32: rnam par 'khrigs pa kun nas gang bar byin gyis
T02D3070:170a-34: de'i 'og tu tsee tya de dag thams cad shel
T02D3070:170a-35: sgong yongs su dag pa'i tshul du rang bzhin gyis
T02D3070:170a-36: rnam par dag cing gsal te /
T02D3070:170a-37: de dag gi dbus su sngags mang nyung gnyes ka'am /
T02D3070:170a-38: yang na rigs so so'i snying po gang gcig po yang rung ste /
T02D3070:170a-39: kha dog gser btso ma bzhin du dangs shing 'tsher ba de las 'od zer sna tshogs byung bas /
T02D3070:170a-40: 'jig rten gyi khams nas nam mkha'i mthas klas pa
T02D3070:170a-41: kun du khyab par sems can gyi don mdzad cing
T02D3070:170b-0: / re ba @170b skong bar byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D3070:170b-1: slar 'dus pas bdag gi spyi bor zhugs par dmigs nas /
T02D3070:170b-2: bdag gi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag ste /
T02D3070:170b-3: shel sgong yongs su dag pa'i tshul du bsam /
T02D3070:170b-4: de bzhin du yon bdag gson gshin gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan du dmigs nas /
T02D3070:170b-5: de'i spyi gtsug tu ye shes kyi 'od zer shin
T02D3070:170b-6: tu 'phro ba dag / tshul gong ma bzhin du
T02D3070:170b-8: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad rnam par dag ste /
T02D3070:170b-9: shel sgong ltar rab tu gsal bar dmigs /
T02D3070:170b-10: yon bdag ji lta ba bzhin du 'khor thams cad la yang dmigs shing byin gyis brlab /
T02D3070:170b-11: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nas
T02D3070:170b-12: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i sems can thams cad la
T02D3070:170b-13: tshul gong ma ltar byin gyis brlab po //
T02D3070:170b-14: de nas bi ma la aushn'i sha'i sngags kyi snying
T02D3070:170b-15: po nyi shu rtsa gcig yan chad 'dzab ci ran
T02D3070:170b-16: cig bya / de'i 'og tu yon bdag dngos sam
T02D3070:170b-17: gzugs brnyan gang yang rung ba de tshul bzhin du
T02D3070:170b-18: cig bya / lus bsrungs la / bi ma la
T02D3070:170b-19: aushn'i sha dang tshul brgya lnga bcu pa bklags pa'i
T02D3070:170b-20: sngags chab cho ga bzhin du btab cing dbang bskur
T02D3070:170b-21: cig bya / lus bsrungs la / ba / spyi bo nas blugs par bya'o //
T02D3070:170b-22: de dang dus gcig tu sngags mkhan cho ga shes pa cig yod na /
T02D3070:170b-23: phyogs bcu'i mgon po yang tshul bzhin du dgug cing aargha gsol te /
T02D3070:170b-24: mchod pa sna lnga la sogs pa dang gtor ma bzang du sbyar la rim bzhin du phul te /
T02D3070:170b-25: 'phags pa thugs dam can khyed kyis mchod pa 'di dag bsnams la /
T02D3070:170b-26: sbyin bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba dgal khyed kyis bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang /
T02D3070:170b-27: don bsgrub cing byin gyis rlobs shig ces bsgo'o //
T02D3070:170b-28: de ltar sngags mkhan cho ga shes pa med na /
T02D3070:170b-29: mchod rten bskor zin pa'i mjug la phyogs bcu'i gtor ma sbyin zhing bsngo'o //
T02D3070:170b-30: de nas rol mo sna tshogs kyis drangs la 'khor
T02D3070:170b-31: thams cad kyis mchod rten de dag la 'od zer
T02D3070:170b-32: sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro bar bsam zhing /
T02D3070:170b-33: lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bsam pa'i rgyud ma nyams par byas te bskor /
T02D3070:170b-34: de lta zin nas yang tsee tya 'debs pa'i cho ga shes pa des /
T02D3070:171a-0: mchod rten de dag las 'od zer byung ba de bdag gi spyi bor @171a * //
T02D3070:171a-2: phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi spyi bor zhugs pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D3070:171a-3: bla na med pa'i mchod pa dang /
T02D3070:171a-4: yon ci 'byor pa yang skabs 'dir dbul lo //
T02D3070:171a-5: de nas aargha tshul bzhin du gsol te /
T02D3070:171a-6: bsngo ba dang smon lam rgyas par byas la 'phags pa rnams dang /
T02D3070:171a-7: mgon po dag slar gshegs par gsol lo //
T02D3070:171a-8: tsee tya'i yo byad la sogs pa kha dog dbye ba ni /
T02D3070:171a-9: las gang byed pa'i khyad par las kha dog dkar po la sogs pa bzhin du byas te /
T02D3070:171a-10: de la zhi ba'i cho ga ni kha dog thams cad dkar por bsgyur ro //
T02D3070:171a-11: rgyas pa'i cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog ser por bsgyur ro //
T02D3070:171a-12: dbang gi cho ga ni yo byad thams cad kha dog dmar por bsgyur ro //
T02D3070:171a-13: mngon spyod kyi cho ga ni yo byad thams cad nag por bsgyur zhes so //
T02D3070:171a-16: tsee tya 'debs pa'i las mi thams cad skra bkru zhing khrus bya ba dang /
T02D3070:171a-17: gos sar pa la sogs pa ci 'byor gyis zung du bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D3070:171a-19: bskor ba'i mi rnams la thog ma nas tha ma'i
T02D3070:171a-20: bar du gzhan gyis ma rig par gyis shig /
